title: Ikkitousen: Gekirin Kousatsu.
original_name: 一騎当千 逆鱗考察。
sinopse:
Ryuubi Gentoku and her friends are invited to a newly discovered hot springs. The gang decides to go to ease their battle wounds and prepare for upcoming challenges. A little side story as a fan service of the popular online comic series.

(Source: MangaHelpers)
